CHAT.comment: Home Visit 5; Mot and Chi sitting at kitchen table
Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi claims that she does not remember the book , and she asks for Mot to read; occasionally Chi recites refrains such as <ate through> and <he was still hungry> and she identifies and counts some of the fruit; context notes say that Mot sometimes points to the words as she reads; after Mot reads through the book she says <next time you can tell me the story>; Chi says <read it? no way>; still , all is reasonably pleasant; I think they assumed that each home visit is the same , so they just took it for granted that we wanted to hear Mot read VHC to her seven-year-old.....

u.a: sounds like someone is tapping the page at each picture
MOT pointing to words as she reads
